title: Google won’t hit 2020 self-driving car goal, says Ford engineer | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Ford SpeedLimiter]()_MD of the Aachen Research and Innovation centre,Pim van der Jagt, explains Ford’s plans for the future_[Ford CEO Mark Field](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ford-ceo-self-driving-cars-coming-within-four-years) surprised many last month when he saidthat Ford could have an autonomous vehicle on the road within the next fouryears.The company has become the first to test autonomous vehicles in a simulatedcity, known as Mcity, near Ford’s headquarters in Detroit, Michigan.But with technical challenges such as those faced by Ford’s own engineers inthe way, it seems this could very well be wishful thinking.
